/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. Power lines crisscross above the street, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
